summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the levy of property taxes; fixing the rates and/or amounts of taxes to be levied, and levying the same upon all taxable property, both real and personal, in the City of Seattle, to finance the departments and activities of City government and to provide for the General Obligation Bond Interest and Redemption requirements for the year beginning on the first day of January 2001; and by a vote of a majority plus one finding a substantial need to use, and providing for the use of, 106% as the regular property tax limit factor.
